newsitem.title: TURKEY: SOCCER-CZECH INTERNATIONAL RADA TO JOIN TRABZONSPOR.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-CZECH INTERNATIONAL RADA TO JOIN TRABZONSPOR.

text.p: Czech international defender Karel Rada is joining leading Turkish club Trabzonspor from Sigma Olumouc of the Czech Republic.
"An agreement in principle has been signed with Rada but neither the transfer fee nor the sum paid to the player has been agreed," Trabzonspor spokesman Hayri Guner said on Wednesday.
Rada was a key figure in the Czech side which reached reached the European championship final last year.
